data.name: MouseWars
data.detailed_description:
MouseWars is a real time multiplayer cursor war game. The cursors have to fight until only one remains.

Features:


  • Play online with your friends or practice with bots
  • Play an exclusive offline, local multiplayer mode by plugging multiple USB mice, or gamepads
  • Two game modes: All vs all and Team vs team
  • Two score types: Deathmatch and Survival
  • 9 types of attacks
  • Up to 8 players per room
  • In-game chat
  • Servers for South America, North America and Europe

data.short_description: MouseWars is a real time multiplayer cursor war game. The cursors have to fight until only one remains.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or higher
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual Core or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMDFX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMDRadeon R9 290X (3 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / Fedora 28
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX9 (shader model 3.0)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 / Fedora 30
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMDFX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMDRadeon R9 290X (3 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
